about_the_game:
Note: This is a very early Pre-Alpha version of My Drug Cartel. Most features are still missing or work-in-progress and the game may contain bugs.

Step into the world of drug trafficking with the My Drug Cartel demo!

Get your hands dirty as you plow fields and sow cannabis. Hang tight as you harvest and dry your precious cannabis crop, ensuring it's ready for the market.

Pack it up with plastic wrap and sell it with your smuggling car to turn a profit. But watch your back - law enforcement is always on the prowl. Defend your farm by buying weapons and ammunition.

Need backup? Hire workers to help you farm or defend your turf against police raids. Strategize wisely to outmaneuver rival cartels and emerge as the top dog in the world of illicit trade.

content_descriptors.notes: My Drug Cartel depicts shoot-outs between police and criminals in a pixelated art style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Violência Extrema
Atos criminosos

short_description: My Drug Cartel is a drug plantation management game with basebuilding and combat elements. This Pre-Alpha Demo lets you try out some of the first mechanics. Grow Cannabis, dry it in the sun and sell it with your smuggling car. Defend your plantation against police by buying weapons and ammunition.
